name: click.vim
summary: Syntax file for the click language
description:
This is the syntax file for the click language of the Click Modular Router Project.
(http://www.pdos.lcs.mit.edu/click/)

The syntax file has the following benefits:
- Keyword highlighting
- Decimal and hexadecimal number highlighting
- Highlighting of
  - Ethernet MAC addresses
  - IPv4 addresses
  - IPv6 addresses (to be improved)
install_details: Put the file into your syntax directory and make your ViM click-aware by following the instructions described in ":help 43.2".

versions.release_notes:
Added highlighting for classes and instances.
Changed mappings for protocols.
Improved string highlighting.
